name: Nice-core
tagline: Computer vision library with interfaces for IPP and LinAL
body:
### Installation

```
$ git clone https://github.com/cvjena/nice-core/
$ cd nice-core
$ make
```

### Authors and Contributors
The library is an initial joint project of several researcher in the computer vision group of the University of Jena.
